name: EOS TRUST
description: EOS Trust (EOST) describes itself as an open-source, community-driven, and decentralized digital currency. EOS Trust is working towards mass-adoption of EOST in real-life applications. The team aims to encourage local businesses to accept EOS Trust as a method of payment, as well as implement EOST into e-commerce scripts. At the consumer level, the goal is to allow users to share money, wire money, or just send a gift to a friend,
